projects.title: Cookie-Stand
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. Was the project Cookie Stand and then it was a long project which I'll be happy to demonstrate in person. It took me a week to complete and it definitely helped me further my skills in coding.

projects.description: One of my favorite projects. I had to replicate the website Vanessa made the exact same way. And well you can see the results now. I used, HTML,CSS AND JavaScript.
